Start processing payments on a global scale

Our gateway offers a full range of processing options

International Partnership

The Handpoint Gateway has direct connections to processors in Europe, United States, and South Africa. We offer our partners the chance to easily deploy their point of sale solution on an international scale by allowing them to use multiple processors in any region currently supported. We make strides every day to expand our network so that we can provide even more choices for our partners.

Secure and reliable Gateway

The Handpoint Gateway is PCI-DSS Level 1 certified, which means that cardholders' sensitive data remains protected according to the latest security standards. Security and fraud prevention are our top priorities, as well as protecting against those with malicious intent. Our Gateway is hosted on Amazon Web Services which makes it easy to scale our solution around the world and ensuring an uptime close to 100%.

Processors and Functionalities

The Handpoint team is constantly working to support new processors and functionalities. If your processor of choice is missing from this list, please contact us directly so we can discuss custom integration. Our current integrations cover the business needs for different markets and allow us to serve the retail, restaurant and supermarket industries across the world.
